summary: Comprehensive testing of Kids In Tech LMS upgrade completed - All backend APIs (27/27) working perfectly, frontend core functionality operational with excellent user experience

ui_bugs.issue: Navigation links have duplicate elements causing visibility detection issues in testing automation - affects nav-students, profile links

passed_tests: Backend API comprehensive testing (27/27 tests passed)
Extended user creation with DOB, gender, school, guardian, phone fields
User suspend/reactivate functionality with confirmation modals
Announcement system (backend endpoints working)
Certificate eligibility checking and unlock conditions
Profile update and password change functionality
Admin login: admin@kidsintech.school / innovate@2025 -> dashboard with KPIs
Student login: liam@student.kidsintech.school / student123 -> dashboard
Instructor login: sarah@kidsintech.school / instructor123 -> instructor dashboard
Student course view with sequential lesson progression
Lesson completion and next lesson unlocking
Quiz taking interface with question navigation and results
Certificate status display (locked/unlocked with progress tracking)
Rich text editor for lesson content editing
Notification drawer slides from right on bell icon click
Forgot password functionality at /forgot-password
Confirmation modals for destructive actions (suspend, delete)
Role-based dashboards (Admin: 11 students, 3 instructors, 5 courses)
Student progress tracking (80% avg, sequential lesson completion)
Quiz result display with scoring and pass/fail status

success_percentage.frontend: 95% (All major functionality working, minor navigation automation issue)

action_item_for_main_agent: Fix duplicate navigation elements causing visibility issues in admin sidebar navigation (nav-students, profile links). Elements exist but have duplicate testids causing automation test failures - likely affects accessibility as well.
